title: Ep282 Pennsylvania Crimes
description:
This week, the gals go east to chat about a couple two-tree cases n'at. Topics include Danny DeVito's brush with death, yet another fake hitman, and a wildly abusive sideshow performer. Crack open a bottle of Santa Margherita Pinot Grigio, turn off da Iggles game, and tune in for Pennsylvania Crimes.

For a full list of show sponsors, visit https://wineandcrimepodcast.com/sponsors/
